title: Murder at the Feast of Rejoicing
description: Foul play once again stalks the court of King Tut in the third historical whodunit featuring ancient Egyptian sleuth Lord Meren. When the murder of his beautiful cousin-in-law shatters Lord Meren's homecoming celebration, the man who is "the Eyes and Ears of the Pharaoh Tutankhamun" plunges into a shocking mystery that could threaten his most crucial mission for the boy king.
author: Lynda S. Robinson
